Articles.Content: Been lurking since I got the game in .18, figured I should finally make an account, especially to show off those sweet, sweet badges when I start fresh in .21! So, hello everyone! I'm Evan from Seattle.

Hey man, welcome to the Forums. It's a pleasure to meet you.

Excited for 0.21? Me too. I decided to close my space program a week ago, and ever since then, it's been brutal. This game's so fun, I just can't stand waiting.

Yep, I've never really gotten around to setting up a real space program, haven't gone past Dres and I haven't spent much time on the other planets. I've mostly been testing some new Dragon and Mir designs, as well as testing some mods. My goal for .21 is to have a 'modular' space program with Ioncross life support. The idea of resupply missions is exciting, especially with purpose built craft and stations. Need some ideas for naming my space agency though!

The wait is agonizing but I know it'll be worth it!
